Entities.Name: Alcohol Use
Entities.Definition: Identification and categorization of alcohol consumption behavior in clinical texts, including status, type, amount, frequency, method, and temporal aspects.

Sample Data.Sentence: The patient has a history of heavy tobacco abuse for many years.

Entities.Name: Drug Use
Entities.Definition: Extraction of drug usage information including frequency, amount, type, and temporal details of usage as recorded in clinical notes.

Sample Data.Sentence: Patient reported occasional use of cocaine over the past two years.

Entities.Name: Nicotine Use
Entities.Definition: Details patient's nicotine consumption patterns including status and temporal details from clinical texts.

Sample Data.Sentence: Smokes two packs of cigarettes a day for the last ten years.

Dataset.Name: Clinical notes from various sources
Dataset.Details: The dataset includes clinical notes sourced from multiple institutions, primarily focusing on substance use details captured in unstructured text.
